column2: title=Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 24 May 2002
image=[[Image:Christies Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 24 May 2002.jpg

column1: '''''Christie's Fine Printed Books and Manuscripts 24 May 2002''''' is an auction catalogue which includes three reproductions of letters from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to [[Nancy Smith]] and a joint manuscript ("[[Index questions]]").
*Lot 409 (pp.278-9): "[[Index questions]]" and [[Letter to Nancy Smith (27 May 1958)]]
